lines.text:
[Referring to Bull and Mrs. Cardmaker]
I don't see why people can't be friends without everyone talking.
Yeah, but what sort of friends are they, darling? That's what we want to know.
Poor Mamie! She was so young! She must have hated to die!
Oh, I don't know. I've seen a hundred people die, and none of them ever seemed to mind it. They was all too sick to mind it.
Oh, there's an old saying. There's only one way into the world, but there's a thousand ways out.
I ain't never hurt any of you kids, did I?
No, you ain't done nothing but give us a lot of pills.
Yeah, my old man says that's all you can do.
Oh, is that so? Wait till your old man gets sick again. see what happens to him.
